name: Super Pet The Cat
description:
Your goal is to pet the cat in as few jumps as possible.

How To Play

  • Click and drag to move
  • Click and drag again to jump in midair, you can jump as many times as you want
  • Your goal is to reach the cat in as few jumps as possible
  • If you use too many jumps (more than Par) then you'll have to restart the level over again.

How To use the Map Editor (optional!)

  • Press F4 to play, you need at least one Spawn and Cat for the camera to work properly
  • Use the number keys to change tools
  • You can press F4 again to switch back to the editor
